data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @cobuspienaar @yasserogier 

Hi all. Gordon reports that he is trying to capture on v2.courtworks.co.za but if he puts any info into the fields on the case details tab, it will not allow him to move to the plaintiff section by clicking next button. However, if he leaves all the fields blank on the case details tab, it does allow him to click next.
